metadata.title: CVE-2021-47206 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: host: ohci-tmio: check return value after callingplatform_get_resource()It will cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL,we need check the return value.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
